description:
This is the fifth July 22nd for Shinpei. Hizuru is convinced Shinpei is a time traveler. Shinpei uses Ushio`s powers to relay his experience to Hizuru, convincing her to join his cause. The group heads to the Kobayakawa`s house to defeat Shiori`s shadow, but they get ambushed. Shinpei thought this death would take him to the sixth timeline, but he instead wakes up in Hizuru`s memory from fourteen years ago.
Source: Disney+
